app.description: Google Calendar is a time management and scheduling service developed by Google. Allows users to create and edit events, with options available for type and time. Available to anyone that has a Gmail account on both mobile and web versions.

selectCalendar.label: Select calendar
selectCalendar.tooltip: Choose which Google Calendar to use for your appointments

statusText.error_getting_busy_times: Error getting busy times from Google Calendar
statusText.redirect_request_does_not_contain_app_id: Redirect request does not contain app ID
statusText.redirect_request_does_not_contain_author: Redirect request does not contain authorization code
statusText.app_was_not_given_required_scopes: App was not given required scopes

toast.request_error: There was a problem with your request.
